mapper.insert: insert into NaverMovie_data(NM_title, NM_media_name, NM_reporter_name, writeDate, keyword, keyword_type, url) values (#{NM_title}, #{NM_media_name}, #{NM_reporter_name}, #{writeDate}, #{keyword}, #{keyword_type}, #{url})
mapper.update: update NaverMovie_data set NM_title = #{NM_title}, NM_media_name = #{NM_media_name}, NM_reporter_name = #{NM_reporter_name}, writeDate = #{writeDate}, keyword = #{keyword}, keyword_type = #{keyword_type}, url = #{url}, updateDate = now() where NM_idx = #{NM_idx}
